name: Officely
headline: Building next generation tools for the hybrid workplace
description: Officely is building the next generation of tools to support the hybrid workplace. Teams can see who’s around on different days, book a desk, or share social plans and important updates. Office managers/admins can get detailed metrics on who came in and when, in a user-friendly format, allowing them to gain critical insights into how their spaces are being used. All wrapped up in a beautiful experience.

# Everything you need to manage your office.
## All in Slack & Teams.
Say goodbye to complicated software or messy spreadsheets.Manage your desks, meeting rooms and car parking spaces all from the apps you already use.
[Free Trial](https://www.getofficely.com/</get-started>)[Book a Demo](https://www.getofficely.com/</book-a-demo>)
  * ![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651c997da47bacea606ce578_Check%20circle.svg)
No credit card required
  * ![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651c997da47bacea606ce578_Check%20circle.svg)
Free to test with your team

## Built for Adoption
**Book a desk in one click**
Traditional desk booking tools are a pain. Clunky interfaces, too many steps, all in a different app. The result? Your team avoids them and your office turns into a ghost town.Officely is different. It slips right into Slack and Teams, making booking a desk, meeting room, your dog or just seeing who will be in the office as easy as possible.
[Hot Desk Booking Software![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651add8ed65a7b79a0b7b853_ArrowRight.svg)](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/simple-desk-booking>)
![Officely Book a Desk in One Click preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/67057f2247c825be3fb95404_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![Officely Insights preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/66fd91daf3083733db81ba3f_Office%20Insights%20Increase%201.png)
**Don’t let your office go to waste**
Nothing kills office vibes like an empty desk. Officely makes sure your team knows who’s in by sending a daily message in Slack or Teams, so everyone can plan their day without playing detective. It’s all about clarity and keeping the good times rolling.
[Flex Office Software![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651add8ed65a7b79a0b7b853_ArrowRight.svg)](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/flex-office-software>)
**Manage your meeting rooms**
Are your meeting rooms constantly double-booked or plagued by no-shows?Meeting Rooms makes it easy to find and reserve meeting spaces, check availability, and manage attendees – right from MS Teams.
[Meeting Room Booking Software![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651add8ed65a7b79a0b7b853_ArrowRight.svg)](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/meeting-room-booking-software>)
![Meeting Rooms preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/677bc5c34eb97e176be3de44_Group%201000006236.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/65ea15965fa3755f032b0256_Slack%20Header%20HERO%20Office%20Broadcast.webp)
**Stop guessing - know who's in**
Nothing kills office vibes like an empty desk. Officely makes sure your team knows who’s in by sending a daily message in Slack or Teams, so everyone can plan their day without playing detective. It’s all about clarity and keeping the good times rolling.
[Hybrid Work Software![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651add8ed65a7b79a0b7b853_ArrowRight.svg)](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/hybrid-work-software>)
### **Manage your car parking**
Say goodbye to the parking lottery! Parkly makes it ridiculously easy to reserve a parking space at your office. No more guesswork, just smooth parking every time.
[Office Parking Management![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651add8ed65a7b79a0b7b853_ArrowRight.svg)](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/parkly>)
![Parkly on Slack preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/66439b8cce9217e4a97e54db_Parkly%20Slack%20Interface%204.webp)
![Officely connects to Slack and MS Teams preview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/66fd92346f312d609862c6e9_Slack%20%26%20Teams%20Interfaces.png)
**All in Slack and Teams—because simplicity wins**
Why make your team download another app they’ll ignore? Our apps live in Slack and Teams, so your team can manage their office life without skipping a beat. It’s easy, it’s familiar, and it’s built for adoption.
[Explore Integrations![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651add8ed65a7b79a0b7b853_ArrowRight.svg)](https://www.getofficely.com/</integrations>)
## All it takes is a few simple steps
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651ae953be38b8b27c97a9ac_Vector%20942.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651ae99e96050c6d3fe5620e_Arrow%208.svg)
**Add Officely into Slack or Teams**
Invite your team, and start booking—all in minutes. Because life’s too short for complicated setups.
**Invite your team**
Onboard your team in one click, all inside Slack or Teams.
**Adoption, sorted**
With seamless desk booking in tools they already use. Your team will never forget to book in again. 
## What our clients have to say about us (all good things)
![Star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651aee01317e7928354c6658_Star.webp)
**5**
Officely solved the problem of Desk booking and hybrid enablement! The fact it lives in Slack means it's not some extra software we have to log into. It's right where we already work every day.
**Beth Lang Head of People @ Lunio**
![Star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651aee01317e7928354c6658_Star.webp)
**5**
"A really great product” - With a new hybrid working model, it's given the team visibility on who's in the office throughout the week, and encourages attendance and team culture. It’s incredibly simple and easy to use for the whole team from their Slack workflow.
**Richard Freeman Principal Delivery Manager @ Gemba Advantage**
![Star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651aee01317e7928354c6658_Star.webp)
**5**
"Nifty tool for Slack” - It helps us keep track of who is working in office vs at home. It allows people to prebook tables so there isn't any clash when people come into office. It keeps people informed of who's working from where, and allows you to choose exactly where you want to work.
**Francesca Pisani Studio Manager @ Draw and Code**

"A key tool in the hybrid working toolkit!” - Officely helps us better manage our hybrid team. It helps us keep tabs on who's in when, encourages in-person collaboration, and just generally makes hybrid working a breeze! It's integration in Slack makes it super easy to use and interact with.

## Built for Adoption
**Book a desk in one click**
Traditional desk booking tools are a pain. Clunky interfaces, too many steps, all in a different app. The result? Your team avoids them and your office turns into a ghost town.Officely is different. It slips right into Slack and Teams, making booking a desk, meeting room, your dog or just seeing who will be in the office as easy as possible.
Hot Desk Booking Software![Arrow right⟨11⟩](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/simple-desk-booking>)
![Officely Book a Desk in One Click preview⟨42⟩].png)
![Officely Insights preview⟨43⟩]
**Don’t let your office go to waste**
Nothing kills office vibes like an empty desk. Officely makes sure your team knows who’s in by sending a daily message in Slack or Teams, so everyone can plan their day without playing detective. It’s all about clarity and keeping the good times rolling.
Flex Office Software![Arrow right⟨11⟩](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/flex-office-software>)
**Manage your meeting rooms**
Are your meeting rooms constantly double-booked or plagued by no-shows?Meeting Rooms makes it easy to find and reserve meeting spaces, check availability, and manage attendees – right from MS Teams.
Meeting Room Booking Software![Arrow right⟨11⟩](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/meeting-room-booking-software>)
![Meeting Rooms preview⟨44⟩]
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/65ea15965fa3755f032b0256_Slack%20Header%20HERO%20Office%20Broadcast.webp)
**Stop guessing - know who's in**
Nothing kills office vibes like an empty desk. Officely makes sure your team knows who’s in by sending a daily message in Slack or Teams, so everyone can plan their day without playing detective. It’s all about clarity and keeping the good times rolling.
Hybrid Work Software![Arrow right⟨11⟩](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/hybrid-work-software>)
### **Manage your car parking**
Say goodbye to the parking lottery! Parkly makes it ridiculously easy to reserve a parking space at your office. No more guesswork, just smooth parking every time.
Office Parking Management![Arrow right⟨11⟩](https://www.getofficely.com/</solutions/parkly>)
![Parkly on Slack preview⟨45⟩]
![Officely connects to Slack and MS Teams preview⟨46⟩]
**All in Slack and Teams—because simplicity wins**
Why make your team download another app they’ll ignore? Our apps live in Slack and Teams, so your team can manage their office life without skipping a beat. It’s easy, it’s familiar, and it’s built for adoption.
Explore Integrations![Arrow right⟨11⟩](https://www.getofficely.com/</integrations>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651ae953be38b8b27c97a9ac_Vector%20942.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fa13dc51bdcf3e992f1ecdd/651ae99e96050c6d3fe5620e_Arrow%208.svg)

Invite your team, and start booking—all in minutes. Because life’s too short for complicated setups.
**Invite your team**
Onboard your team in one click, all inside Slack or Teams.
**Adoption, sorted**
With seamless desk booking in tools they already use. Your team will never forget to book in again.

generated_description:
**Officely: Simplifying the Hybrid Workplace Experience**

**Website**: [Officely](https://www.getofficely.com?utm_source=yc)  
**Founded**: 2017  
**Location**: London, United Kingdom  
**Team Size**: 11 employees  
**Y Combinator**: Batch S17  
**Mission**: To build next-generation tools for the hybrid workplace.

### Overview
Officely is addressing a fundamental challenge in the modern workplace: the shift to hybrid work. Created to streamline the office experience, Officely allows teams to see who’s in the office and when, enabling flexible desk booking, social planning, and important updates. With its user-friendly metrics, office managers can easily track attendance and gain insights into office usage—all while maintaining a beautiful and intuitive design.

### Core Features
1. **Hot Desk Booking**: Easily book desks for in-office days.
2. **Meeting Room Management**: Simplify the process of reserving meeting spaces and managing attendance.
3. **Office Parking Management**: Reserve parking spots to eliminate the chaos of parking logistics.
4. **Employee Visibility**: Regular updates to the team about who will be in the office, boosting attendance and camaraderie.

### Why Use Officely?
The platform integrates seamlessly with the tools teams are already using—like Slack and Microsoft Teams—making it easy for employees to adapt without complicating their workflow. This ease of integration is crucial, as traditional booking applications often deter team usage due to clunky interfaces and multiple logins.

### Pricing Plans
- **Free Plan**: Up to 5 users, all features included.
- **Premium Plan**: $4/user/month, unlimited users.
- **Basic Plan**: $2.50/user/month, also supporting unlimited users, focusing on desk booking.

Officely is currently offering a 20% discount as a seasonal promotion, emphasizing their commitment to accessibility and value for teams looking to enhance their hybrid work arrangements.

### Client Testimonials
Customers praise Officely for its intuitive design and practicality in the hybrid workplace. Users highlight the ease of booking desks and the visibility it provides into team presence, which helps maintain workplace culture and collaboration.

### Conclusion
In a world where flexible work models are becoming the norm, Officely stands out as a necessary tool for businesses aiming to navigate this transition efficiently. By placing users at the center of its design and focusing on integration with existing tools, Officely effectively bridges the gap between remote and in-office work, making office life easier for everyone involved. 

For businesses looking to modernize their approach to workspace management, Officely presents a compelling solution.
